page.title: 03RECREATION
page.content: There is a wide choice of recreation in our area for example :The Cooper Park which has a wide variety of things to do such as trampolining, roller skating, crazy golf, tennis, swings, roundabouts, seasaws, chutes and an area to play table tennis.There is also a Tuck Shop which sells refreshments.The Gordon District Council own the park. The Linden Centre has many different clubs such as the Keepfit, Bowling, Country Dancing,Camera, Play Group, Youth Training Scheme, Tufty, Mother and Toddler, Youth Club and Badminton. The center also has a tuck shop you can sit down and have a cup of coffee. The Cricket Club comitee.Just now there is approximately 150 members. The paying fee is eleven pounds for paying members and two pounds for non playing members.
